column4: what a program i must to use for the manage partitions ??? (like Acronis Partition Expert and PQ magic)
try gnome partition editor.. or gparted as it's also called

mm.. you can't mess with partitions while you're using it.... you'll have to unmount it first (if you compare to windows, the program unmount the drive autoamtically but you still can't use it while you're moving it etc)
